name: RogueLight (CozySunrise, BigAwesome, Maelwurf)
description:
Shine your flashlight at the opponents and try to survive as long as possible.

Controls :

"WASD" moves the player

"R" changes the flashlight beam

"left-shift" for sprinting

"U" locks the beam into one direction

Features :

Enemies dropping chests upon death, these chests strengthen your characters stats at random

STATS :

-HP (because u cant die, doesn't make a difference)

-MovementSpeed

-Armor (meaning enemies do less damage on you)

-Attackdamage

-Attackspeed

-Bleedchance (to apply a bleeding debuff upon enemies)

Known Bugs : cannot die, player disappearing, enemy health scaling to infinity
